headline: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) Collaborates To Accelerate AI-Driven Drug Discovery With New Alliances
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) experienced a notable increase of 35% over the last quarter, amidst its key collaboration with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure and Absci to boost AI-driven drug discovery using AMD's advanced hardware. This partnership aligns with the overarching market optimism as the major U.S. stock indexes reached record highs, enhanced by expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts. AMD's significant share buybacks and a partnership with HCLTech for digital transformation may have...
